text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 254292007 (Tumor staging)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    1149162008International Staging System for multiple myeloma (staging scale)
    1149163003Revised International Staging System for multiple myeloma (staging scale)
    246165003Extent of disease (attribute)
    418414003The revised European-American Lymphoma classification (qualifier value)
    418823005The World Health Organization classification of lymphoid malignancies (qualifier value)

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 258318002 (Generic anatomical site tumor invasion status)
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 258309004 (Generic lymph node tumor invasion status stage (tumor staging))
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 258233007 (Generic tumor staging descriptor (tumor staging))
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 258271004 (Specific tumor staging descriptor (tumor staging))
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    42114005Walter Reed stage 1 (tumor staging)
    15972002Walter Reed stage 2 (tumor staging)
    13808002Walter Reed stage 3 (tumor staging)
    74542008Walter Reed stage 4 (tumor staging)
    66470009Walter Reed stage 5 (tumor staging)
    83200007Walter Reed stage 6 (tumor staging)

name: CancerStagingMethodVS
title: Cancer Staging Method Value Set
publisher: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

contact.name: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

description: System or method used for staging cancers. The terms in this value set describe staging systems, not specific stages or descriptors used within those systems.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

concept.display: International Staging System for multiple myeloma (staging scale)
Revised International Staging System for multiple myeloma (staging scale)
The revised European-American Lymphoma classification (qualifier value)
The World Health Organization classification of lymphoid malignancies (qualifier value)
